ADD_EXECUTABLE(Demo06_SimpleBuoyancy demo06.cpp OgreNewtonApplication.cpp OgreNewtonFrameListener.cpp)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Demo06_SimpleBuoyancy ${OGRE_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUI_LIBRARIES} ${OGRENEWT_LIBRARIES} ${OIS_LIBRARIES} ${CEGUIOGRE_LIBRARIES})

#INSTALL(TARGETS Demo06_SimpleBuoyancy RUNTIME DESTINATION ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin)
